title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, December 25, 2020
description: It was Dickens' "A Christmas Carol" that revived Christmas after the Puritans had stamped out the old medieval Christmas in England.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was Dickens' "A Christmas Carol" that revived Christmas after the Puritans had stamped out the old medieval Christmas in England.
